long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
ListFromText turns any text into useful list.
Our official extension allows you to add the text you selected in any website as input in the ListFromText web app.
On the website page you would like to extract text from, select text, right-click over it and click on Send text to ListFromText.
Visit https://listfromtext.com for more info on how our app works!
